content: the simple triangle shawlette was designed with chelsea luxe duet kits in mind to make a perfect small shawl for this season drape it around your neck use it as a mask cover or wear it like a stylish bandana you can leave it bare or even add a tassel if you want to add more fun level of difficulty beginner gauge 19 sts & 29 row = 4 / 10cm in stockinette stitch needle us 6 needle 32 in circular notions darning needle yarn 1 chelsea luxe cobblestone 90% superwash merino 10% nylon 436 yards fingering weight 1 chelsea luxe mohair 72% kid mohair 28% silk 459 yards lace weight color leopard
